Food Delivery App for Restaurants to Speed Up Your Business Growth

Boost your food app for restaurant app business by implementing the latest technologies to cater to the need of your customers.

Developing a mobile-friendly design is a must in today’s mobile-driven world. With every small business going online and reaching out to their audience, it is a primary need to have a mobile application. The food industries have emerged as the fastest growing online business as they reach out to their customers at a faster speed with the help of on-demand food delivery app.

We, at The NineHertz, do online food delivery apps and restaurant mobility solution that create a perfect blend of technologies and business requirements while focusing on the users’ perspective and preferences. Expanding your business reach with a more accurate and easy to navigate the application, we bring high ROI and user-engagement to your business.

Along with the advanced features of food delivery app for Android, iOS, and Web, we provide a free consultation to our clients. Let’s collaborate together for delivering a prominent app solution to our audience.

Hire food delivery app developer to create your responsive online food order app!

Restaurant Mobile App Development Solutions

Food Ordering Portal

Designing the finest food ordering portal by implementing innovative solutions that compliment your business objective. Our restaurant app developer designs highly reliable and business-driven applications.

Food Order, Delivery and Pick Up App

With quick food ordering app development, we bring easy and multiple payment options to take away your food without a waste of time. Select your delivery address and get your food delivered at your place within a few minutes.

Restaurant Management System

We make it easy to schedule your delivery request by our management solutions that keep track of your delivery request, completed, or awaited orders.

Restaurant Search Portal

Discover the nearby restaurants or area or popular flavors easily with our search portal. To develop food delivery app user-engaging and hassle-free, our app developers implement best navigation metrics.

Restaurant Table Booking App

Book restaurant table in your favorite restaurant from anywhere. You can fix the menu in advance to enjoy your evening comfortably. Being a top restaurant app development company, we develop apps that use 3D technology to help you explore the restaurant interior and designing for selecting the best table for yourself.

Diverse Range of Restaurant Mobile App

Be it a café or a family restaurant or a delivery services or a chain of restaurants, we make sure we offer the best suited mobile app solution to our clients. Meeting your expectations and enhancing your customer-base is our mission.

Restaurant Web Portal

Our restaurant mobile app developers design responsive designs with user interactive interface that perfectly blends with the theme of your business. To create the perfect feel and vibe of your restaurant and attract customers’ attention, we provide advance unique features.

Food Coupons and Deals App

Offer the best deals and discounts to your customers and engage more traffic to your business. Increase sales and ROI with the latest on-demand app technologies in the market. We design features like push notification to let your user know with the hot deal of the day, refer and earn feature, wallet discount, etc.

Online Food Delivery Apps Development for Business

Food Delivery Startups

For beginners and young minds, it is easy for you to spend a large amount on app development. We have a complete package with all the advanced features to create a food app for beginners with a fresh idea. The food delivery app package for startups are highly affordable and has all the required compatible plugins.

We also provide free support and maintenance for sometime after launching the application on the respective store. Invest little in app development and earn more profit with it.

Food Delivery Startups
Restaurant Chains

Restaurant Chains

Do you have a chain of restaurants and need an app to manage the delivery orders? We are the one-stop solution to develop user-friendly and alluring food delivery app for your business. Such an app needs experienced developers and good planning. We have both balls in our court. Our certified food app developers can develop any complex food delivery app in no time.

The best part of choosing our 8+ years experience developers is they can be hired at a nominal cost which saves much of your money.

Aggregator Food Apps

Aggregator food apps are the apps that stand between restaurants and consumers such as Zomato, Swiggy, etc. These apps have multiple users and restaurants along with the delivery drivers. The aggregator apps are considered to be one of the complex food delivery application. Do you want to the owner of such an application?

We are ready to develop a cost-effective and most fascinating aggregator food delivery app for you. Hire our experts to turn your dream into reality.

Aggregator Food Apps

Single Restaurants

Your customers may crave for the favorite food from your restaurant. Deliver delicious and mouth-watering food at the doorstep of your customers. We offer food delivery applications for a single restaurant as well. From the online payment option to each and every minute detail, we develop the food delivery application keeping all the aspects in mind. Get the food delivery application for your restaurant and let your delicious servings reach freshly brewed to the customers.

Hire food delivery app developers at a nominal cost as we understand the value of each penny.

Restaurant Management Software Solutions

Comprehend your kitchen tasks from the start of receiving the order to processing food to serving, everything is managed efficiently with an integrated restaurant mobile app.

  • Restaurant Management App
  • Waiter Panel
  • Customer App
  • Kitchen Dashboard

Restaurant Order Management App

Restaurant manager can keep track of the orders and the staff’s task for optimizing time and managing teamwork for providing ultimate customer experience.

Features:

  • Order track
  • Waiter list with dashboard and pin
  • Maintaining restaurant panel
  • Updating and managing restaurant profile
  • Assigning tables to waiters
  • Analyzing feedbacks and ratings
  • Managing cash inflows
  • Identifying empty seats on the floor

Waiter Panel

Allocating and completing the task without any mistake to help serving better to your customers.

Features:

  • Taking orders and assigning tables
  • Bill generation
  • Selecting order items and adding extra ingredients
  • Alert notifications from customers
  • Passing orders to the kitchen
  • Getting customers feedback

Customer App

Our restaurant mobile app developers create a seamless ordering system to enhance customer experience.

Features:

  • Customer sign up and login
  • Selecting a table of choice
  • Choosing food from a diverse menu
  • Alert notification to call the waiter
  • Detail ingredient analysis of food
  • Billing invoice

Kitchen Dashboard

Managing kitchen for each order efficiently for timely and beautifully presenting the dish to the customers.

Features:

  • Order wise serving the table
  • Responding to the pending order
  • Notification after competition of order
  • Push notification to the waiter for the new order
  • Dashboard management system

Advantages of Restaurant Mobile App Development

Online Ordering

Our restaurant mobile app developers create a visually rich design for helping customers get the exact dish look and authenticity. We reshape the dining experience by embedding the seamless user interface and features. Get one-touch check out option for ordering take out and easy food delivery system.

Push Notification

Notify your customers with the trending deals and offers that your restaurant is offering. Connect with your frequent customers and offer discounts, coupons or voucher. Using the latest technologies like iBeacon, IoT, AR, 3D, etc. along with Geo-location, we help users to find the best deal restaurants around them.

Supply Chain Management

Monitor supply chain process from buying raw resources to processes food ingredients. We help you to compare the prices of your expenses for creating a profitable experience and cost-effective solutions.

Multiple Platform Support

Our restaurant app developers design multiple platform support like iOS, Android, Windows, etc. thus, you can operate the application from any device.

Menu Management

We create a customizable menu option for changing the chef’s special daily and adding videos of the dishes to give a better idea to the customer about the dish that will be served.

24×7 Support and Maintenance

We provide our clients with’ pre and post maintenance services. Our team of restaurant mobile app developers is skilled and highly responsive in dealing with our clients’ queries.

Our Significant Food Delivery App Development Services

Transaction History

Have a quick overview of your transaction history and get an invoice or digital receipt for your orders instantly.

QR Code

In-app QR code feature for making a quick payment to the delivery executive.
`

Payment Gateways

Multiple payment options like Wallet, Net Banking, COD, Debit or Credit cards, etc.

Refer A Friend

Earn referral points on each successful referral. Connect a large user base by offering loyalty rewards.

Compatibility

A highly compatible app that can run smoothly over multiple platforms like Android, iOS, or Web.

Categorization

Simplify your food choices or preferences based on different categories like health food, diet food, Veg, Non-Veg, Dessert, etc.
